CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 左边的；左侧的；左面的；左翼的；剩余的；遗留的；被遗弃的；被忽视的
左边；左侧；左翼；左派；（政党内的）激进派；激进分子；左手边；左侧部分；左侧区域；左侧场地；左手拳
离去；离开；遗留；剩余；遗弃；丢弃；遗忘；遗赠；留下；忘记带走；辍学；离职；寄存；使处于；（leave的过去式和过去分词）

word_group.brief_definition: 一个人留在那里；独自离开；独自留下
(尤指跳舞或体育运动时)非常笨拙, 笨手笨脚
受到忽视或冷落；停下；住手
寄存的行李；行李寄存处

bilingual.source: Cinderella enters the stage from the left.
The driver is standing upright on the left.
The library is on the left of the playground.
Go along Long Street and it's on the left.
This is my dad, Fred, on the left.
bilingual.target: 这是我的爸爸弗雷德，在左边。

bilingual.source: The character's name is written on the left-hand side.
Aladdin enters from the left and sits on the floor.
bilingual.target: 阿拉丁从左边进入并坐在地上。

list.abstract: Left（英[left]，美[left]），英语单词，作形容词用，为左面的；左边的；左侧。作副词用，为在左面；向左。作名词用，为左面；左翼；激进力量。短语搭配有left over（剩下），例句为“Sam felt blue and left alone.（萨姆感到沮丧，就一个人走了。）” Left相关反义词有right、arrive、enter等。

yingyinNormal.en: No, no, no. A little bit more to the left.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不对，往左边放点。

yingyinNormal.en: You mean like, going left? You're doing fine.Come on.
yingyinNormal.zh: 像是说往左边进攻吗？你做的很好啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Which way, left? Right. No, I mean go left. I said left was right like correct. Okay. This actually feels kind of nice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哪条路，左边？是的，不，我的意思是往左走，左边的路是对的。好吧。这样感觉还挺好的。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey. So, where are they? Across the street, in the left window.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们在哪里？对面街的左边窗口。

yingyinNormal.en: Chandler, I want you to run a post pattern to the left, okay. And sweetie.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要你左边防守，而亲爱的，你…

yingyinNormal.en: You keep glancing to my left. Oh, I suppose I was just looking away.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你一直在瞄我左边。我只是移开视线而已。

yingyinNormal.en: Everyone step up to the left side of your broomstick. Come on now, hurry up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大家都站到飞天扫帚的左边，好了，动作快点。

yingyinNormal.en: Bathroom is down the hall to your left. I would have told him to do it too. Can I adopt you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 洗手间在走廊那头，左边。我也让他这么做过。我能领养你吗?

yingyinNormal.en: Pick one. Left. Thank you. You're welcome. Ross. Joey. We should just switch. Yeah absolutely. Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 选一边。左边。谢谢。不客气。罗斯。乔伊。我们交换吧。没错。

yingyinNormal.en: We could play outside. We could sit on the left side of the couch. I could use the bathroom at 8:20.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们能去户外玩儿。我们能坐在沙发左边。我能在8点20上厕所。

yingyinNormal.en: Miss Rabbit is driving the school bus. And to our left, we can see some hills with trees.
yingyinNormal.zh: 兔小姐开着学校巴士来啦。在我的左边，我们能看到一些山坡，上面种着树。

yingyinNormal.en: Real amateur hour. Another inch to the left and the igniter would have been too far from the gas tank to set it off.
yingyinNormal.zh: 业余得很，再往左边一英寸点火器就离汽车油箱远得根本点不着了。

yingyinNormal.en: This house on the left, I would say they're probably motivated. Wow, a lot of people seem very motivated.
yingyinNormal.zh: 左边这家，我觉得他们也可能很积极。天啊，看起来积极卖房的人不少啊。

yingyinNormal.en: What? Rach. Come on, that's terrible. They're babies. They're all beautiful. Third one from the left?
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么？瑞秋，那太可怕了，他们是宝宝，他们都很可爱。左边数过来第三个？

yingyinNormal.en: To the left of Circular Quay stands the famous "Coat-hanger", the Sydney Harbour Bridge.
yingyinNormal.zh: 环形码头的左边耸立着有名的悉尼海港大桥，其形状非常特别，因而有了「衣架」的称号。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, every time. I forgot them on the day of our first win, and it's worked ever since. Now scooch to the left.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的，每一次。我们第一次赢球那天我就忘拿了，这招屡试不爽，往左边挪一下。

yingyinNormal.en: Listen up, Pierre Del Rio. Get off your desk, sit in your chair, pick up the red pen to the left of you and take down everything I say.
yingyinNormal.zh: 听着，皮耶戴尔里奥，离开你的桌子，坐到椅子上，拿起左边的红笔，写下我说的话。

yingyinNormal.en: I left him behind. No. No. We all left together.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我把他丢下了。不，不，我们都把他丢下了。

yingyinNormal.en: She left a lot behind.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她留下了一大堆东西

yingyinNormal.en: You know, when I left Earth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我离开地球那天。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: political groups who support the ideas and beliefs of socialism

examination_example.sentence: Avoiding this rather than promoting it should unite the <highlight>left</highlight> and right of the political spectrum.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了避免而非促进这种情况，应该联合政党的左右两派。

examination_example.sentence: Embarrassing scandals and the popularity of the republican <highlight>left</highlight> in the recent Euro-elections have forced him to eat his words and stand down.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 令人尴尬的丑闻和近期欧洲选举中左翼共和党的人气，已经迫使他收回前言并退位。
第三，他们目前在偏左派的政治力量中占主导地位。

examination_example.sentence: Read the following text and answer the questions by finding information from the <highlight>left</highlight> column.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 阅读下面的课文，通过从左栏中寻找信息来回答问题。

examination_example.sentence: Its reputation in Vermont is already so damaged that it has nothing <highlight>left</highlight> to lose by going to war with the state.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它在佛蒙特州的声誉已经受损，以致于与州政府宣战也不会再损失什么。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The brain region responsible for the fine motor skills of the <highlight>left</highlight> hand's fingers is likely to grow.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 负责左手手指精细运动技能的大脑区域可能会生长。

word_usage.usage:
left表“左边”时，其前常有物主代词或定冠词修饰。
示例：In Britain cars drive on the left.
在英国，汽车靠左行驶。

?“在...左边”，可用on the/one's left，或at/to one's left表达。若表示动态的“向”左边，或指较长的距离时，用介词to。
示例：The general sat to his left.
将军在他的左侧就座。

left作副词表“左边”时，其前通常不用介词或冠词。
示例：Turn left.
向左拐。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Curious if the <highlight>left</highlight> hemispheres were indeed remaining awake to process information detected in the surrounding environment, Dr. Sasaki re-ran the experiment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 佐佐木博士好奇大脑左半球是否真的保持清醒来处理周围环境中检测到的信息，于是重新进行了实验。

examination_example.sentence: If the <highlight>left</highlight> hemisphere was staying alert to keep guard in a strange environment, then it would react to the irregular beeps.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果大脑的左半球在陌生的环境中保持警惕，那么它会对不规则的嘟嘟声做出反应。

examination_example.sentence: On the first night only, the <highlight>left</highlight> hemispheres (半球) of their brains did not sleep nearly as deeply as their right hemispheres did.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 仅在第一天晚上，他们大脑的左半球就没有右半球睡得那么深。

word_usage.usage:
?“在...左边”，可用on the/one's left，或at/to one's left表达。若表示动态的“向”左边，或指较长的距离时，用介词to。
示例：The general sat to his left.
将军在他的左侧就座。

left表“左边”时，其前常有物主代词或定冠词修饰。
示例：In Britain cars drive on the left.
在英国，汽车靠左行驶。

left作副词表“左边”时，其前通常不用介词或冠词。
示例：Turn left.
向左拐。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: If the monkeys touched the <highlight>left</highlight> side of the screen, they would be rewarded with seven drops of water or juice.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果猴子触摸屏幕的左侧，他们将得到七滴水或果汁作为奖励。

examination_example.sentence: It annoys Welty that, at 78, her <highlight>left</highlight> ear has now given out.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 78岁的Welty的左耳现在已经失去了功能，这让她很恼火。

examination_example.sentence: I was so nervous that I could hardly tell which direction was <highlight>left</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我紧张得几乎分不清哪个方向是左。

examination_example.sentence: The instructor kept repeating the words, “Speed up!” “Slow down!” “Turn <highlight>left</highlight>!”
examination_example.sentence_trans: 老师不断地重复这几个字：“加速！”“慢下来！”“向左转！”

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 一个人留在那里；独自离开；独自留下

examination_example.sentence: Darrius was born with three fingers on his right hand and one on his <highlight>left</highlight> hand.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 达瑞斯出生时右手有三个手指，左手有一个。

examination_example.sentence: The bank is on the <highlight>left</highlight> of the supermarket.
The answer to the second question was written down on the <highlight>left</highlight> side.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第二个问题的答案写在了左边。

examination_example.sentence: There is an egg <highlight>left</highlight> on the plate.
But there are only a few old forests <highlight>left</highlight> in Canada.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是加拿大只剩下几片古老的森林。

examination_example.sentence: He was sad recently because he thought that he had nothing <highlight>left</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他最近很伤心，因为他觉得自己一无所有了。

word_usage.usage:
left表“左边”时，其前常有物主代词或定冠词修饰。
示例：In Britain cars drive on the left.
在英国，汽车靠左行驶。

?“在...左边”，可用on the/one's left，或at/to one's left表达。若表示动态的“向”左边，或指较长的距离时，用介词to。
示例：The general sat to his left.
将军在他的左侧就座。

left作副词表“左边”时，其前通常不用介词或冠词。
示例：Turn left.
向左拐。
